description_x: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with his Pokémon.
description_y: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
name: Bulbasaur

description_x: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
description_y: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
evYield:
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Ivysaur

description_x: By spreading the broad petals of its flower and catching the sun's rays, it fills its body with power.
description_y: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.
evYield:
2 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Venusaur

description_x: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it's healthy, the flame burns brightly.
description_y: From the time is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
name: Charmander

description_x: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.
description_y: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.
name: Charmeleon

description_x: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.
description_y: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
name: Charizard

description_x: It shelters itself in its shell, then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.
description_y: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.
name: Squirtle

description_x: When tapped, this Pokémon will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.
description_y: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.
name: Wartortle

description_x: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
description_y: The pressurized water jets on this brutal Pokémon's shell are used for high-speed tackles.
name: Blastoise

description_x: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
description_y: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
name: Caterpie

description_x: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.
description_y: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.
name: Metapod

description_x: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.
description_y: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this Pokémon can fly about even in rain.
evYield:
2 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Butterfree

description_x: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.
description_y: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.
name: Weedle

description_x: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
description_y: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
name: Kakuna

description_x: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
description_y: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.
name: Beedrill

description_x: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.
description_y: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.
name: Pidgey

description_x: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.
description_y: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.
name: Pidgeotto

description_x: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.
description_y: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.
name: Pidgeot

description_x: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scavenges for edibles the entire day.
description_y: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.
name: Rattata

description_x: It whittles its constantly growing fangs by gnawing on hard things. It can chew apart cinder walls.
description_y: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food
name: Raticate

description_x: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
description_y: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.
name: Spearow

description_x: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.
description_y: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.
name: Fearow

description_x: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
description_y: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.
name: Ekans

description_x: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.
description_y: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.
name: Arbok

description_x: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.
description_y: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.
name: Pikachu

description_x: When its electricity builds, its muscles are stimulated, and it becomes more aggressive than usual.
description_y: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.
name: Raichu

description_x: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.
description_y: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.
name: Sandshrew

description_x: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.
description_y: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.
name: Sandslash

description_x: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.
description_y: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.
name: Nidoran ♀

description_x: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.
description_y: When feeding its young, it first chews the food into a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.
name: Nidorina

description_x: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
description_y: The body is covered by stiff, needlelike scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.
name: Nidoqueen

description_x: It scans its surroundings by raising its ears out of the grass. Its toxic horn is for protection.
description_y: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.
name: Nidoran ♂

description_x: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.
description_y: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.
name: Nidorino

description_x: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.
description_y: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.
name: Nidoking

description_x: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy under a full moon.
description_y: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
name: Clefairy

description_x: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.
description_y: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
name: Clefable

description_x: When it is born, it has just one snow-white tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.
description_y: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
name: Vulpix

description_x: It has nine long tales and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
description_y: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
name: Ninetales

description_x: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.
description_y: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.
name: Jigglypuff

description_x: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.
description_y: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.
name: Wigglytuff

description_x: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from its mouth.
description_y: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.
name: Zubat

description_x: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
description_y: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.
name: Golbat

description_x: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
description_y: Its scientific name is â€œOddium Wanderus.â€ At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots.
name: Oddish

description_x: Smells incredibly foul! However, around one out of a thousand people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.
description_y: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.
name: Gloom

description_x: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
description_y: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
name: Vileplume

description_x: Growing out of the bug's back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.
description_y: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
name: Paras

description_x: A mushroom grown larger than the host's body controls Parasect. It scatters poisonous spores.
description_y: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.
name: Parasect

description_x: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.
description_y: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.
name: Venonat

description_x: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.
description_y: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.
name: Venomoth

description_x: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.
description_y: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.
name: Diglett

description_x: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.
description_y: Extremely powerful, they can dig through even the hardest ground to a depth of over 60 miles.
name: Dugtrio

description_x: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
description_y: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
name: Meowth

description_x: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
description_y: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.
name: Persian

description_x: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.
description_y: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.
name: Psyduck

description_x: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.
description_y: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.
name: Golduck

description_x: It's unsafe to approach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can't distinguish friends from foes.
description_y: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.
name: Mankey

description_x: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
description_y: It is always outrageously furious. If it gives chase, it will tenaciously track the target no matter how far.
name: Primeape

description_x: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.
description_y: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
name: Growlithe

description_x: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
description_y: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty. Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.
name: Arcanine

description_x: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.
description_y: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.
location_x: Route 14, Route 15, Route 16, Route 19, Route 21, Pokémon Village
location_y: Route 14, Route 15, Route 16, Route 19, Route 21, Pokémon Village
name: Poliwag

description_x: It can live in or out of water. When out of water, it constantly sweats to keep its body slimy.
description_y: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water.
location_x:
Route 14, Route 15, Route 16, Route 19, Route 21, Pokémon Village
Friend Safari
location_y:
Route 14, Route 15, Route 16, Route 19, Route 21, Pokémon Village
Friend Safari
name: Poliwhirl

description_x: With extremely tough muscles, it can keep swimming in the Pacific Ocean without resting.
description_y: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.
name: Poliwrath

description_x: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.
description_y: It senses impending attacks and teleports away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.
name: Abra

description_x: When it uses its psychic power, it emits strong alpha waves that can ruin precision devices.
description_y: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.
name: Kadabra

description_x: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.
description_y: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.
name: Alakazam

description_x: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.
description_y: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
name: Machop

description_x: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
description_y: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.
name: Machoke

description_x: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.
description_y: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.
name: Machamp

description_x: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.
description_y: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant.
name: Bellsprout

description_x: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.
description_y: It spits out Poison Powder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of Acid.
name: Weepinbell

description_x: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.
description_y: Once ingested into this Pokémon's body, even the hardest object will melt into nothing.
name: Victreebel

description_x: Its body is virtually composed of water. It shoots strange beams from its crystal-like eyes.
description_y: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by their stingers.
location_x: Route 8, 12, Ambrette Town, Azure Bay, Cyllage City
location_y: Route 8, 12, Ambrette Town, Azure Bay, Cyllage City
name: Tentacool

description_x: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.
description_y: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain.
name: Tentacruel

description_x: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.
description_y: It is impossible to distinguish from rocks. It slams against others in contests of hardness.
name: Geodude

description_x: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn't mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.
description_y: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.
location_x: Route 13, Route 18, Terminus Cave, Victory Road
location_y: Route 13, Route 18, Terminus Cave, Victory Road
name: Graveler

description_x: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.
description_y: Even dynamite can't harm its hard, boulder-like body. It sheds its hide just once a year.
name: Golem

description_x: As a newborn, it can barely stand. However, through galloping, its legs are made tougher and faster.
description_y: Its legs grow strong while it chases after its parent. It runs in fields and mountains all day.
name: Ponyta

description_x: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.
description_y: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.
name: Rapidash

description_x: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.
description_y: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.
name: Slowpoke

description_x: An attached Shellder won't let go because of the tasty flavor that oozes out of its tail.
description_y: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.
name: Slowbro

description_x: The units at the sides of its body generate antigravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.
description_y: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges Thunder Wave and so on from the units at its sides.
name: Magnemite

description_x: A linked cluster formed of several Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.
description_y: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.
name: Magneton

description_x: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.
description_y: It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest.
name: Farfetch'd

description_x: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.
description_y: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.
name: Doduo

description_x: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads--even for a second--will get pecked severely.
description_y: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.
name: Dodrio

description_x: A Pokémon that lives on icebergs. It swims in the sea using the point on its head to break up ice.
description_y: Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of -40 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Seel

description_x: Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.
description_y: Its streamlined body has little drag in water. The colder the temperature, the friskier it gets.
name: Dewgong

description_x: Sludge exposed to X-rays from the moon transformed into Grimer. It loves feeding on filthy things.
description_y: Appears in flithy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.
name: Grimer

description_x: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.
description_y: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.
name: Muk

description_x: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
description_y: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.
name: Shellder

description_x: Cloyster that live in the seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.
description_y: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
name: Cloyster

description_x: Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.
description_y: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
name: Gastly

description_x: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
description_y: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.
location_x: Route 14, Route 19, Victory Road, Frost Cavern
location_y: Route 14, Route 19, Victory Road, Frost Cavern
name: Haunter

description_x: It hides in shadows. It is said that if Gengar is hiding, it cools the area by nearly 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
description_y: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.
name: Gengar

description_x: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by Diglett.
description_y: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.
name: Onix

description_x: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating only bad dreams.
description_y: If you think that you had a good dream but you can't remember it, a Drowzee has probably eaten it.
name: Drowzee

description_x: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.
description_y: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.
name: Hypno

description_x: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.
description_y: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
name: Krabby

description_x: The large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
description_y: Its pincers grow peculiarly large. If it lifts the pincers too fast, it loses its balance and staggers.
name: Kingler

description_x: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.
description_y: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.
name: Voltorb

description_x: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of "The Bomb Ball."
description_y: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.
name: Electrode

description_x: Its six eggs converse using telepathy. They can quickly gather if they become sparated.
description_y: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life-form more like plant seeds.
name: Exeggcute

description_x: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.
description_y: It is called "The Walking Jungle." If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.
name: Exeggutor

description_x: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.
description_y: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.
name: Cubone

description_x: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.
description_y: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.
name: Marowak

description_x: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
description_y: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.
name: Hitmonlee

description_x: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.
description_y: The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this Pokémon. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.
name: Hitmonchan

description_x: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.
description_y: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking.
name: Lickitung

description_x: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
description_y: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.
name: Koffing

description_x: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
description_y: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing.
name: Weezing

description_x: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging Tackles.
description_y: It is inept at turning because of its four short legs. It can only charge and run in one direction.
name: Rhyhorn

description_x: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
description_y: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
name: Rhydon

description_x: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.
description_y: It lays several eggs in a day. The eggs are apparently rich in nutrients and extremely delicious.
name: Chansey

description_x: Many writhing vines cover it, so its true identity remains unknown. The blue vines grow its whole life long.
description_y: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.
name: Tangela

description_x: It raises its offspring in its belly pouch. It lets the baby out to play only when it feels safe.
description_y: If it is safe, the young gets out of the belly pouch to play. The adult keeps a close eye on the youngster.
name: Kangaskhan

description_x: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.
description_y: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.
name: Horsea

description_x: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.
description_y: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.
name: Seadra

description_x: It swims at a steady 5 knots. If it senses danger, it will strike back with its sharp horn.
description_y: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the water dancer.
name: Goldeen

description_x: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.
description_y: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with its life.
name: Seaking

description_x: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core remains intact.
description_y: It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night, its central core flashes with a red light.
name: Staryu

description_x: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.
description_y: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.
name: Starmie

description_x: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.
description_y: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.
name: Mr. Mime

description_x: It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly.
description_y: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.
name: Scyther

description_x: Frost Cavern
description_y: Frost Cavern
location_x: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.
location_y: It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said.
name: Jynx

description_x: Electricity runs across the surface of its body. In darkness, its entire body glows a whitish blue.
description_y: It loves to feed on strong electricity. It occasionally appears around large power plants and so on.
name: Electabuzz

description_x: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather's body temperature is nearly 2,200 degree Fahrenheit.
description_y: Born in the spout of a volcano, its body is covered by flames that shimmer like the sun.
name: Magmar

description_x: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.
description_y: It swings its long pincer horns wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.
name: Pinsir

description_x: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.
description_y: When it is about to tackle, it whips its body repeatedly with its three long tails.
name: Tauros

description_x: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokémon in the world.
description_y: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.
name: Magikarp

description_x: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
description_y: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
name: Gyarados

description_x: They have gentle hearts. Because they rarely fight, many have been caught. Their number has dwindled.
description_y: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.
name: Lapras

description_x: It has the ability to reconstitute its entire cellular structure to transform into whatever it sees.
description_y: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.
name: Ditto

description_x: A rare Pokémon that adapts to harsh environments by taking on different evolutionary forms.
description_y: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.
name: Eevee

description_x: It prefers beautiful shores. With cells similar to water molecules, it could melt in water.
description_y: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.
name: Vaporeon

description_x: Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on end if it becomes charged with electricity.
description_y: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.
name: Jolteon

description_x: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.
description_y: It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of nearly 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Flareon

description_x: A manmade Pokémon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.
description_y: A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. It is capable of moving freely in cyberspace.
name: Porygon

description_x: A prehistoric Pokémon that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.
description_y: Revived from an ancient fossil, this Pokémon uses air stored in its shell to sink and rise in water.
location_x: Revive Helix Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to Y
location_y: Revive Helix Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to Y
name: Omanyte

description_x: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.
description_y: Once wrapped around its prey, it never lets go. It eats the prey by tearing at it with sharp fangs.
name: Omastar

description_x: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.
description_y: This Pokémon was regenerated from the fossil of an ancient creature. It protects itself with a hard shell.
location_x: Revive Dome Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to Y
location_y: Revive Dome Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to Y
name: Kabuto

description_x: In the water, it tucks in its limbs to become more compact, then it wiggles its shell to swim fast.
description_y: A slim and fast swimmer. It slices its prey with its sharp sickles and drinks the body fluids.
name: Kabutops

description_x: It was regenerated from a dinosaur's genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.
description_y: This vicious Pokémon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.
name: Aerodactyl

description_x: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
description_y: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.
name: Snorlax

description_x: A legendary bird Pokémon. It can create blizzards by freezing moisture in the air.
description_y: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.
name: Articuno

description_x: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.
description_y: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.
name: Zapdos

description_x: It is said to be the legendary bird Pokémon of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flare of flames.
description_y: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.
name: Moltres

description_x: It is called the "Mirage Pokémon" because so few have seen it. Its shed skin has been found.
description_y: This Pokémon is full of life energy. It continually sheds its skin and grows steadily larger.
name: Dratini

description_x: Its crystalline orbs appear to give this Pokémon the power to freely control the weather.
description_y: A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to have the ability to change the weather.
name: Dragonair

description_x: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.
description_y: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.
name: Dragonite

description_x: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.
description_y: A Pokémon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.
name: Mewtwo

description_x: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.
description_y: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokémon, so it can use all kinds of techniques.
name: Mew

description_x: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up sunrays.
description_y: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.
name: Chikorita

description_x: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.
description_y: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.
name: Bayleef

description_x: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.
description_y: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.
name: Meganium

description_x: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
description_y: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.
name: Cyndaquil

description_x: Before battle, it turns its back on its opponent to demonstrate how ferociously its fire blazes
description_y: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.
name: Quilava

description_x: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.
description_y: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
name: Typhlosion

description_x: It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.
description_y: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.
name: Totodile

description_x: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
description_y: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.
name: Croconaw

description_x: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
description_y: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
name: Feraligatr

description_x: When acting as a lookout, it warns others of danger by screeching and hitting the ground with its tail.
description_y: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.
name: Sentret

description_x: The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up around them. It corners foes with speed.
description_y: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.
name: Furret

description_x: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.
description_y: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.
name: Hoothoot

description_x: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.
description_y: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
name: Noctowl

description_x: When the weather turns cold, lots of Ledyba gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.
description_y: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.
name: Ledyba

description_x: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.
description_y: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.
name: Ledian

description_x: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits patiently for prey to be trapped.
description_y: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.
name: Spinarak

description_x: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It's hard to tell which end is which.
description_y: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.
location_x:
Terminus Cave, Victory Road
Friend Safari
location_y:
Terminus Cave, Victory Road
Friend Safari
name: Ariados

description_x: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
description_y: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.
name: Crobat

description_x: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
description_y: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.
name: Chinchou

description_x: Lanturn's light can shine up from great depths. It is nicknamed "The Deep-Sea Star."
description_y: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light. With the prey incapacitated, the Pokémon swallows it in a single gulp.
name: Lanturn

description_x: It plays with others by touching tails and setting off sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.
description_y: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.
name: Pichu

description_x: Because of its unusual, starlike silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
description_y: Many appear when the night skies are filled with shooting stars. They disappear with sunrise.
name: Cleffa

description_x: Instead of walking with its short legs, it moves around by bouncing on its soft, tender body.
description_y: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.
name: Igglybuff

description_x: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.
description_y: A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping Togepi stand up.
name: Togepi

description_x: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
description_y: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
name: Togetic

description_x: Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.
description_y: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.
name: Natu

description_x: Once it begins to meditate at sunrise, the entire day will pass before it will move again.
description_y: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
name: Xatu

description_x: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
description_y: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.
name: Mareep

description_x: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.
description_y: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.
name: Flaaffy

description_x: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
description_y: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
name: Ampharos

description_x: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
description_y: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.
name: Bellosom

description_x: The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can stay dry, even when it plays in the water.
description_y: The tip of its tail is filled with oil that is lighter than water, so it acts as a float.
name: Marril

description_x: Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish the movements of living things on riverbeds.
description_y: The bubble-like pattern on its stomach helps it camouflage itself when it's in the water.
name: Azumarril

description_x: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears more similar to rock than to vegetation.
description_y: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
name: Sudowoodo

description_x: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.
description_y: If Poliwag and Poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.
name: Politoed

description_x: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.
description_y: It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.
name: Hoppip

description_x: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.
description_y: It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun.
name: Skiploom

description_x: Blown by seasonal winds, it circles the globe, scattering cotton spores as it goes.
description_y: Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.
name: Jumpluff

description_x: It lives atop tall trees. When leaping from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.
description_y: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.
name: Aipom

description_x: It may plummet from the sky. If attacked by a Spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.
description_y: It lives by drinking only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else.
name: Sunkern

description_x: As the hot season approaches, the petals on this Pokémon's face become more vivid and lively.
description_y: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.
name: Sunflora

description_x: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss prey--even those behind it.
description_y: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.
name: Yanma

description_x: This Pokémon lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.
description_y: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.
name: Wooper

description_x: It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river's bottom, waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.
description_y: This carefree Pokémon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.
name: Quagsire

description_x: The tip of its forked tail quivers when it is predicting its opponent's next move.
description_y: Its fur is so sensitive, it can feel minute shifts in the air and predict the weather...and its foes' thoughts.
name: Espeon

description_x: The light of the moon changed Eevee's genetic structure. It lurks in darkness for prey.
description_y: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it's filled with a mysterious power.
name: Umbreon

description_x: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another's stashes.
description_y: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.
name: Murkrow

description_x: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
description_y: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.
name: Slowking

description_x: It gets nourishment from fear that it absorbs into its red orbs. In daytime, it sleeps in darkness.
description_y: It likes playing mischievous tricks, such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.
name: Misdreavus
